item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, January 5, 2025 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:

25. Show HN: Pretty-print your chess games using Prettier (80 points | 8 comments)
26. Don't Clobber the Frame Pointer (60 points | 16 comments)
27. Web page annoyances that I don't inflict on you here (100 points | 21 comments)
